mapper.sql: id, name, instruction, price_instruction, start_country, start_city, arrive_country, arrive_city, arrive_destination, deadline, adult_price, child_price, enable
mapper.insert: insert into flight (id, name, instruction, price_instruction, start_country, start_city, arrive_country, arrive_city, arrive_destination, deadline, adult_price, child_price, enable) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instruction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priceInstruction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arriveCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arriveCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arriveDestination,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{adultPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{childPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{enable,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update flight
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
instruction = #{instruction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price_instruction = #{priceInstruction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_country = #{startCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_city = #{startCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
arrive_country = #{arriveCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
arrive_city = #{arriveCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
arrive_destination = #{arriveDestination,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deadline = #{deadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
adult_price = #{adultPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
child_price = #{childPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update flight set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, instruction = #{instruction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price_instruction = #{priceInstruction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_country = #{startCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_city = #{startCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, arrive_country = #{arriveCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, arrive_city = #{arriveCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, arrive_destination = #{arriveDestination,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deadline = #{deadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, adult_price = #{adultPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, child_price = #{childPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from flight where 1=1
AND arrive_destination = #{arriveDestination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by id DESC
